title: Fear
verses: Isaiah 41:10 (WEB) — “Don’t be afraid, for I am with you.”
Psalm 56:3–4 (WEB) — “When I am afraid, I will put my trust in you.”
Joshua 1:9 (WEB) — “Be strong and courageous… Yahweh your God is with you.”
John 14:27 (WEB) — “Don’t let your heart be troubled.”
body: Fear shrinks when God’s presence grows large in your view. Name the fear, recall His promises, and take a step of trust. Courage is fear moving toward obedience.
prayer: God of peace, draw near and steady me. Replace my fear with faith and my panic with Your presence. Lead me today. Amen.
